title: Button
description: Discover how to create and customize buttons with different styles and functionalities.

meta.title: LNGRZUI | Button Documentation
meta.description: Discover how to create and customize buttons with different styles and functionalities.
meta.keywords: component library, reusable components, documentation, application development, UI toolkit

content.overview-desc: Buttons are essential user interface elements used for triggering actions or navigation within a web application. This page provides an overview of the Button component, including its variations, styling options, and event handling capabilities. It equips developers with the knowledge to create interactive and visually appealing buttons for their projects.
content.how-to-desc: To utilize the Button component, import it into your project and use it within your desired context. Customize the appearance and behavior of the button by applying appropriate props such as size, color, and onClick event handler. Refer to the documentation for specific usage examples and detailed guidance.
